title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 27 April 2016 - XWiki

12:32 <martinus\_\_> vmassol, do you know if we can set a default smtp port for the mail app in xwiki.cfg ?  
13:06 <lkrejci> has quit  
13:06 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
13:09 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
13:09 <msmeria> has quit  
13:19 <ClemensR> @martinus\_\_: use mail.sender.port in xwiki.properties  
13:29 <xwiki\_finstern> has joined #xwiki  
13:30 <vmassol> martinus\_\_: sure, there's a UI for this  
13:30 <vmassol> see http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Mail+Application  
13:36 <lkrejci> has quit  
13:37 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
13:37 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
13:41 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:43 <msmeria1> has quit  
13:54 <boubou> xwiki\_finstern where should I place the xwiki war files ?  
14:05 <woshilapin> has quit  
14:14 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
14:14 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:40 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
14:55 <boubou> what is the latest version ?  
14:55 <boubou> can I consider the git version as stable ?  
14:57 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
14:59 <ujjwal> has joined #xwiki  
15:11 <ClemensR> build instructions to build xwiki from source are on http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Building  
15:17 <xwiki\_finstern> so to list ALL documents in a livetable, whatever the class used to create them, you use in $options the following :  
15:17 <ClemensR> yes, they should have that parent, except if they are even sub-sub-pages  
15:17 <xwiki\_finstern> 'extraParams' : "&parent=yourspace.WebHome"  
15:17 <xwiki\_finstern> and they will all show  
15:18 <xwiki\_finstern> for some reasons unknown, with ${doc.space} I only get the space  
15:18 <xwiki\_finstern> it won't work for nested docs you're right  
15:18 <xwiki\_finstern> but as I don't have the use for nested pages .. well it work just fine  
15:19 <xwiki\_finstern> it's already said in the doc  
15:23 <ClemensR> I guess ${doc.space} expands to "&parent=yourspace", not "&parent=yourspace.WebHome", and the "yourspace" is not the parent of the other pages, but the  "yourspace.WebHome" is  
15:24 <boubou> may I consider 8.1-milestone-1 as stable ?  
15:25 <boubou> hummmm  
15:25 <boubou>  Not for production.  
15:26 <boubou> how should I upgrade from 7.0.1 to 8.0 ?  
15:26 <boubou> is it a special procedure ?  
15:26 <vmassol> google!  
15:26 <vmassol> have you tried googling for:  
15:26 <vmassol> "xwiki upgrade"  
15:26 <vmassol> ?  
15:27 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
15:38 <xwiki\_finstern> [15:23] <+ClemensR> I guess ${doc.space} expands to "&parent=yourspace"[...] but the  "yourspace.WebHome" is <- exactly  
15:39 <xwiki\_finstern> Should I add this special case as an example in the documentation ?  
15:41 <ClemensR> hm, if you know a parent is always a page and not a space, this is not so special a case, but it seems this is less than obvious, so it probably helps to document it  
15:41 <xwiki\_finstern> it work, of course, only if you don't use the "nested document" functionnality  
15:42 <xwiki\_finstern> honestly, I'm not a dev' .. I have some knowledge of java, a little bit of C/C++ and that's all  
15:42 <xwiki\_finstern> I had to learn some basics about JSON just to understand how it worked  
15:43 <ClemensR> hm, current live table uses the doc.location=... for looking up deeper into nested pages  
15:43 <xwiki\_finstern> I don't think that all your clients are fully experienced dev', and being able to just use the documented scripting of Livetable can help a lot  
15:43 <ClemensR> well, that is enough for a dev, and the will to learn new things, of course ;)  
15:44 <ClemensR> yes, improving docs shouldalwatys help  
15:45 <xwiki\_finstern> as a side note, I still havn't been able to manage to make the "extraParams" : "&yourProperty\_class=yourSpace.yourClass" function work  
15:45 <xwiki\_finstern> maybe somone with extended knowledge and understanding of how it work should add a real example  
15:46 <boubou> Attachments on the filesystem  
15:46 <boubou> where sould be located ?  
15:47 <xwiki\_finstern> by default, it's in the database if my memory is not bugged ^^  
15:47 <boubou> how can I be sure ?  
15:47 <boubou> ;)  
15:47 <boubou> your brain seem not bugged  
15:48 <xwiki\_finstern> it is, but sometime it agree to work as intended ..  
15:48 <tmortagne> boubou: you have a lot about attachment FS store on http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Attachments#HFilesystemAttachmentStore  
15:50 <xwiki\_finstern> about the customxproperty, in extraparams, is it using this function in livetableResults ?  
15:50 <xwiki\_finstern> #gridresultwithfilter("$!request.classname" $request.collist.split(',') '' "${extra}" $params)  
15:50 <ClemensR> ah, I see the docs for 'extraParams' 'parent=...'  is plain wrong, its a copy & paste error from the line above ...  
15:51 <xwiki\_finstern> oh yes I forgot to report this too  
15:51 <ClemensR> would have to read the code how the extraParams are passed through, either  
15:51 <xwiki\_finstern> yes in the parent option, it have indeed "extraParams" : "&space=${doc.space}" instead of "&parent=${doc.space}"  
15:52 <xwiki\_finstern> it should be fixed, but I managed to understand this by myself, as it had no sense  
15:53 <xwiki\_finstern> I was more bugged by this :  
15:53 <xwiki\_finstern> This option can also be used to view properties of classes other than the one declared in className ("extraParams" : "&yourProperty\_class=yourSpace.yourClass"  
15:53 <xwiki\_finstern> as I couldn't understand how it work  
15:53 <xwiki\_finstern> what is this "yourProperty\_class" ?  
15:53 <xwiki\_finstern> the name of your property with a "\_class" at the end ?  
15:55 <ClemensR> um, this is indeed unclear. I have to admit I never used this feature ...  
15:56 <xwiki\_finstern> if you manage to make it work, I'm curious about how it work  
15:56 <tmortagne> hmm looks like we need to add useSSL=false in MySQL connection URL with most recent version, just upgrade to Ubuntu 16.05 and ending up with 10 lines of warning about that when starting XWiki  
15:56 <tmortagne> (most recent versions of MySQL I mean)  
16:00 <ClemensR> there is a bug report at mySQL for it http://bugs.mysql.com/bug.php?id=80198  but I am not sure if they want to fix it  
16:02 <tmortagne> the warning does seems to be here on purpose  
16:02 <tmortagne> at least it's not a bug from technical point of view  
16:03 <tmortagne> it sure is annoying :)  
16:04 <tmortagne> also http://bugs.mysql.com/bug.php?id=80198 seems to be more about what is in the warning than the fact of getting a warning  
16:04 <ClemensR> I guess it does not hurt to add it, even if it is used with an older mysql server  
16:16 <Evi> has joined #xwiki  
16:18 <Evi> hey guys, I have a quesion concerning the statistics module. Referring to this page http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Statistics+Application the most viewed pages within the wiki can be displayed. Can it also be displayed WHO actually has viewed a specific page?  
16:19 <vmassol> Evi: no  
16:19 <vmassol> it only aggregates data  
16:29 <Enygma`> has quit

16:39 <gdelhumeau> [ANN] The maven part of the release is done. Like tmortagne, you can commit now :)  
16:39 <Evi> ok, thx, vmassol!  
16:39 <tmortagne> ok ok I did not wait for the official announcement O:-)

17:57 <vmassol> (about the backward compat macro)
